channel.title: Mathematics | JooYoung Seo: a Learning Scientist for Inclusive Learning Ecologies

item.title: Discovering Informal Learning Cultures of Blind Individuals Pursuing STEM Disciplines: A Quantitative Ethnography Using Listserv Archives
item.description:
Click the Cite button above to import publication metadata into your reference management software.

This work has been presented in the First International Confrence on Quantitative Ethnography, and awarded The Cengage Fellowship.
